senselogic.sitevision.api.script.app

Interface RestAppInvokerFactory<O>

  • Type Parameters:
    O - script object

    @Requireable(value="RestAppInvokerFactory")
public interface RestAppInvokerFactory<O>
    Creates RestAppInvoker instances.

    Some code examples

    Below is an example of how to get a RestAppInvoker instance using the path (of the headless custom module). 

       var restAppInvokerFactory = require('RestAppInvokerFactory'),
       restAppInvoker = restAppInvokerFactory.fromPath('/rest-api/my-rest-app');

    if (restAppInvoker) {
       // Use the RESTApp invoker...
    }

    Below is an example of how to get a RestAppInvoker instance using a Node. Note that the Node must be of type sv:restApp, sv:headlessCustomModule or sv:marketplaceHeadlessCustomModule. 

       var restAppInvokerFactory = require('RestAppInvokerFactory'),
       restAppInvoker = restAppInvokerFactory.fromNode(aNode);

    if (restAppInvoker) {
       // Use the RESTApp invoker...
    }

    Below is an example of how to get a RestAppInvoker instance using a Node identifier. Note that the identifier must be for a Node of type sv:restApp, sv:headlessCustomModule or sv:marketplaceHeadlessCustomModule (i.e. an identifier prefixed "361.", "188." or "211."). 

       var restAppInvokerFactory = require('RestAppInvokerFactory'),
       restAppInvoker = restAppInvokerFactory.fromIdentifier(aIdentifier);

    if (restAppInvoker) {
       // Use the RESTApp invoker...
    }

    See RestAppInvoker for more code examples.

    Since:
    Sitevision 7
    Author:
    Magnus LÃ¶vgren
    See Also:
    RestAppInvoker

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RestAppInvoker<O> fromIdentifier(String aIdentifier)
      Creates a RestAppInvoker via the Identifier of a RESTApp or a Headless custom module.
      RestAppInvoker<O> fromNode(Node aNode)
      Creates a RestAppInvoker via a RESTApp Node or a Headless custom module Node.
      RestAppInvoker<O> fromPath(String aPath)
      Creates a RestAppInvoker via the Path of a Headless custom module.

    • Method Detail

      • fromPath

        RestAppInvoker<O> fromPath(String aPath)
        Creates a RestAppInvoker via the Path of a Headless custom module.
        Parameters:
        aPath - the path of the Headless custom module (sv:headlessCustomModule or sv:marketplaceHeadlessCustomModule)
        Returns:
        the RestAppInvoker for the active RESTApp of the module, or null if no matching RESTApp could be found

      • fromNode

        RestAppInvoker<O> fromNode(Node aNode)
        Creates a RestAppInvoker via a RESTApp Node or a Headless custom module Node.
        Parameters:
        aNode - the RESTApp (sv:restApp) or the Headless custom module (sv:headlessCustomModule or sv:marketplaceHeadlessCustomModule)
        Returns:
        the RestAppInvoker for the RESTApp, or null if no matching RESTApp could be found

      • fromIdentifier

        RestAppInvoker<O> fromIdentifier(String aIdentifier)
        Creates a RestAppInvoker via the Identifier of a RESTApp or a Headless custom module.
        Parameters:
        aIdentifier - the identifier of the RESTApp (sv:restApp) or the Headless custom module (sv:headlessCustomModule or sv:marketplaceHeadlessCustomModule), i.e. an identifier prefixed with "361.", "188." or "211.".
        Returns:
        the RestAppInvoker for the resolved RESTApp, or null if no matching RESTApp could be found

Sitevision - Portal and Content Management Made Easy
Sitevision is an advanced Java enterprise portal product and a portlet container (JSR 286) that implements Java Content Repository (JSR 283).
